website_summaries.verdict: This sprayer is built to deliver more power than most for the price.
pros: Includes an automatic shut off feature
Operates for a long time without getting overheated
Easy to adjust the spray pattern
cons: Built to deliver 2,100 PSI max – but generally operates at a lower level and may not pack the punch you expect

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by this tool.
customer_reviews.text: Well, given the reviews I read on various electric power washers I am happy to give this a good rating. First, very easy to assemble. Only 6 screws to attach three parts that came with main body. Second, power cord adequately long. Third, it did a great job cleaning my 15 year old trek deck. I have used it about 8 hours total without any hitches. Gave it 4/5 because only two things i noticed. One, the washing wand/gun when assembled hits the ground when resting in its holder, and two, it seemed like I had to occasionally adjust the spray to keep it how I wanted it. Good luck with yours!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Massaro

customer_reviews.title: The turbo sprayer nozzle (not attached to the spray gun ...
customer_reviews.text: The turbo sprayer nozzle (not attached to the spray gun in the thumbnail picture) is the ideal attachment to use, however, if you're looking to use a foam cannon or something that particular nozzle will not work. Not sure if this will work with Adam's Polishes Foam Cannon - mine hasn't come in the mail yet!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Previte

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. We took the approach that if we use it more than 3 days its less expensive than a rental. So far so good, did a great job on back patio and front porch and stairs. Wife is going to tackle the stone retaining wall and driveway tomorrow. Only issue I ahve seen is that the "hose filter" assembly where you attach the garden hose does occassionally pop off if you are not careful about moving it around.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: Hose that connects to the sprayer wand burst after only a few uses. I contacted their customer service using the only route available (email) and it’s been 6 days without a response. You cannot replace the hose by buying another one because they don’t sell them. They are nowhere to be located on the web. They’re cheap and it did a good job but broke quickly and cannot he replaced. Invest in a better brand if you want to use this more than 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Broke/useless warranty
customer_reviews.text: We used the power washer to wash our house and concrete. It worked fairly good. The pressure was good, but the hose kept popping off where it was connected to the power washer. It was extremely frustrating to have to stop and turn everything off to connect it back. The 3rd time we used it when it popped off, it wouldn’t connect back at all. We contacted the company because it was still under warranty. They want us to ship it to them at a cost of $68. They’ll look at it and try to fix it. It’s one part I need and I can’t buy just that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: No customer support
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for 2 days. Then I come home and hear the motor running. There is a tiny plastic piece on the pressure valve that failed and left the motor running for several hours. Trying to get a hold of a replacement part and PowRyte refers me to amazon and amazon refers me to PowRyte. The part is a 50cent part and there is no place to purchase the part, heck, if I knew what it looked like I could probably 3d print or machine a replacement. Yet neither company can help.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product!!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment!! I was so excited to read the reviews on this product in hopes of it performing to my expectations. What's most disappointing is that it sprays in such a small area and the water force seems less than adequate. For rinsing off a car - it MIGHT be ok. Definitely not suited for bigger jobs such as sidewalks and driveways. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: This is hands-down the best power washer in this price range.
customer_reviews.text: When you follow the directions (and wear closed-toe boots, you animal), this'll basically do it all for any light-to-intermediate job you need done. It couldn't be easier to put together and use. It annihilates moss, grime, dirt, and even the baked-on desert "rust" that accumulates on concrete in Phoenix and similar places after years of neglect. I accidentally stripped the smooth top layer right off part of my concrete walkway - my fault - but it's good to know this baby has that kind of power under the hood if I ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cash
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly not sure what to expect from an electric, plug-in device. However, although it was missing the crank to wind the chord it is easy to use, light and efficient! The North side of my house was dirtier and nastier than the funky Baltimore Inner Harbor. Now, clean and immaculate! It is smooth, light and packed enough punch to get the toughest grime off! I was skeptical and feared a weak, eco-friendly hipster machine but must admit I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: PA Potholes

customer_reviews.title: Nice - not great
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is electric but the PSI are really substandard for my needs. I tried to use it to clean tile. It was not strong enough to remove dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Omegaman

customer_reviews.title: multiple problems
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst pressure washer I have ever used. Started off with pieces missing off of it, no spool for the cord or the hose. I emailed them to no avail. Now the GFCI is completely broken for no reason. Rendering my pressure washer unusable. And on top of all of that the little Quick Connect has never works right. You have to put some extra extra muscle on it and even after then it still leaks and pulls out easily. I am very dissatisfied with this product more than anything I have bought on Amazon. I spent good money on this just to figure out that product quality does not matter and neither do my concerns
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous710

customer_reviews.title: Green/black connector
customer_reviews.text: Was working great until the hose attachment stopped connecting. The green/black connect that you connect the hose to won’t stay in. Once I turn the water on it pops out. Looks like one of the white tabs inside is missing.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Not for serious power-washing
customer_reviews.text: Only power washes at 0 degrees with the adjustable nozzle. Wider settings are weaker than simply using a nozzle on a hose without a power washer. This unit WILL NOT power wash at a wider angle. The turbo nozzle is about the same but a little stronger than the wide settings on the adjustable nozzle; it might be good for washing your car.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Good

customer_reviews.title: Good product buy could have been better
customer_reviews.text: pressure is decent but as others said the wheels are flimsy. Also the wand holder is not designed very well to hold wand. If I was to buy it again I would buy the one with wrap-up hose option because it is too much hose to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kazi

customer_reviews.title: Do research outside of Amazon before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had researched this outside of Amazon before I bought it. Usually I do. Plain and simple it doesn't work. The spray came out in little tiny circles with no pressure to speak of. I could go on and on, but just do your research. I just put it in the trash after 1 use. At least I learned a valuable lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: It does its job and then some
customer_reviews.text: With some creativity, you can use this for virtually any cleaning exterior job; house, vehicles, plants, etc. Everything is great for functionality. Mobility is my only downfall, where I have to lean to grab the handle to even use the wheels for transfer, but it is fairly lightweight (not great for back conditions though), to just carry. A higher handle assembly would be better, but I can make one of those ;). Im loving every bit of this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight machine, has more power than expected! great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: uforocks2008

customer_reviews.title: Great power washer
customer_reviews.text: No complaints this thing works great power wash my house I clean my car clean the concrete for the price I've got my money's worth ten times over you can add soap this has a lot of power works great very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: David Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you, this thing is a power House of pressure..
customer_reviews.text: Really love this thing. Easy to hook up, pretty straight forward. Does an excellent job! Did my 32 ft by 32 ft deck and my driveway, sidewalks and porch. Spinning head works flawlessly. I absolutely recommend this pressure washer for any use. Easy to maneuver, handle, use, and assemble and disassemble. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: William Nadiak

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 3 months then died
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t hold up. Worked great for 3 months then died.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith T. Hendra

customer_reviews.title: not quality
customer_reviews.text: to wash my cars. Was good for s while, then started making noise . Stopped pumping this year. Took the pump apart and the bearings were gone.
customer_reviews.author: ernest watts

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I let my girlfriend put it together and told her to go clean the back patio. It looks like it had done a decent job for the price 👌🏽😭
customer_reviews.author: NRG

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: After a year of minimum use this just stopped working. Doesn’t turn on at all. I would say if I combined all the hours I used it would be less then 5 as mainly used it for washing car
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Good, But a Major Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer works well and seems to be made pretty well. The small piece where the inlet hose attaches is made of plastic and looks pretty flimsy, but I think it'll last as long as a great deal of care is used when moving the cleaner. Having said all that, I'd love to get my hands on the moron who decided there was no need for a way to lock the handle in the ON position. I really don't enjoy having to squeeze the trigger continuously for a two or three hour job. Sounds like some more useless input from Ralph Nader.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The pressure wand suddenly couldn't be adjusted - either very thin stream or very wide stream. Company, when I just checked has no contact info.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: PowRyte Elite 1.80 GPM Electric Pressure Washer
customer_reviews.text: works no leak powerful for home owner time will tell used once for outside siding seem well constructed
customer_reviews.author: sami

customer_reviews.title: It works as it is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this power washer for my son-in-law as a Christmas gift. I own one just like it and I am extremely satisfied with mine! So, my S-I-L should be as happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ken VanSickle

customer_reviews.title: This power washer works great, light and easy to use, yet powerful.
customer_reviews.text: We washed outside walls, the driveway, and pool area. This is the best washer we have had and is light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: michael connolly

customer_reviews.title: Love the way hoses connects to the device!
customer_reviews.text: Really great to be able to connect and disconnect the hose so easily.
customer_reviews.author: MTemps

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase, Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing. It’s pretty strong so make sure you avoid chipping paint. Cleans decks, patio furniture, patio and brick. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Mason

customer_reviews.title: powerful for its size
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to put together. The power wand cleans sidewalk vinyl fencing and patios. The other wand is for washing the car only. Long hose to the wand and really long power cord. Really a solid purchase for HOME use.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D Williams Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great powerwasher at a great price
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my new powerwasher. It is so easy to use, light weight and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Power Washer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Works well with plenty of power. Has various tips for different uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. Cleaned large deck like a champ. Well worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: KennyDnAK

customer_reviews.title: Good buy if you dont have alot to spend
customer_reviews.text: B-. Wish trigger could be locken in the on position. Works ok up close but not so great at any distance. Pictures are without using wash solution.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Patterson

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Works like a charm and I'm just your average home owner. I love to find uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Clean your deck and furniture quickly spinning action
customer_reviews.text: Wow the water actually spins like a cleaning brush. Fast and strong powerfull washer
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve DiUlio

customer_reviews.title: Good power in compact size
customer_reviews.text: Quality build. Powerful washer. Easy to assemble. Easy to store away when done due to small size.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L.

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for one day
customer_reviews.text: Second time I went to use it after a few months of sitting it did not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: This washer is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This washer is so easy to use. Does a great job.. We used on patio and exterior furniture, and vinyl siding. It did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Poynter

customer_reviews.title: Broke after little use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a bit but after a year or less it broke and there are absolutely zero videos online to help repair or even diagnose a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Phillippi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior woman and I was able to assemble and use the washer with no problem. It is wonderful to have a power washer that is strong and that I am able to handle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: used it for the first time last week. It was better than I expected. no more dirty pickup truck.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Peter Ciminelli

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I love this over any gas powetwasher I’ve had in the past! Great value as well!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this power washer and he loves it. It is light weight, easy to use, and does a terrific job
customer_reviews.author: Dian

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to set up, really like the length of the cords and hoses! I have used it for very long periods of time to power wash my house and have zero leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Pressure
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed it for, pressure is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Messed up within months and even before then struggles to get the water through the pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: If you want soap or water
customer_reviews.text: Storage of electrical cord very poor designed also need to change wandsIf you want soap or water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT  !
customer_reviews.text: Assembly very simple.. once we found the right tip. Cleaned my back patio and the side of the house with just water. FANTASTIC !! LOVE MY NEW TOY ! Once you start cleaning, it's hard to STOP !😊
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Chapman

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little pressure washer for the home-gamer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pressure washer for the home-gamer. Wouldn't be worth a damn on a commercial job, but it should clean your deck and truck with no problems. It would be nice if it came with another nozzle that had a wide fan as opposed to just the bulldog style rotating nozzle and adjustable needle tip.
customer_reviews.author: stuff buyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd electric pressure washer in about 15 years or so. By far the best performance of all 3. Easy to operate and gets the job done. The only thing I would caution on is the connector to the hose is a snap in and plastic... although I have had no problems, it makes me a little nervous (I prefer metals on this kind of connector). Love this thing and would recommend it to any do it yourself-er that has work to do that a big machine is too much for.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin Little Farmhouse

customer_reviews.title: I switched to the power sprayer and that was a bit better, but not good enough to clean my siding
customer_reviews.text: I could be doing something wrong, but with the one nozzle, my garden hose has more of a powerful spray than when it is hooked up to this machine. I switched to the power sprayer and that was a bit better, but not good enough to clean my siding. Total waste of money. I will still have to hire someone to come out and clean my siding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PowRyte Elite 2100 PSI 1.80 GPM Electric Pressure Washer, Electric Power Washer with Stepless Angle Adjustment Spray Nozzle, Extra Turbo Nozzle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars100 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
